text: Bei den Bundestagswahlen am 23. Februar stehen Sie, liebe Bürgerinnen und Bürger, vor einer wichtigen Entscheidung.
text_en: In the Bundestag elections on February 23, you, dear citizens, will be faced with an important decision.
context: For an active foreign policy145 For a future-proof multilateralism149 For human rights and democratic development150 For security and peace in Europe and the world152 For a modern, defensible Bundeswehr153 For global climate protection155 For strong partnerships and international justice156 Preamble In the Bundestag elections on February 23, you, dear citizens, will be faced with an important decision.
input_text: In the Bundestag elections on February 23, you, dear citizens, will be faced with an important decision. </s> </s> For an active foreign policy145 For a future-proof multilateralism149 For human rights and democratic development150 For security and peace in Europe and the world152 For a modern, defensible Bundeswehr153 For global climate protection155 For strong partnerships and international justice156 Preamble In the Bundestag elections on February 23, you, dear citizens, will be faced with an important decision. </s>

text: Es geht darum, wer für unser Land in dieser herausfordernden Zeit Regierungsverantwortung trägt.
text_en: It is a question of who will bear government responsibility for our country in these challenging times.
context: In the Bundestag elections on February 23, you, dear citizens, will be faced with an important decision. It is a question of who will bear government responsibility for our country in these challenging times.
input_text: It is a question of who will bear government responsibility for our country in these challenging times. </s> </s> In the Bundestag elections on February 23, you, dear citizens, will be faced with an important decision. It is a question of who will bear government responsibility for our country in these challenging times. </s>

text: Jetzt kommt es auf die Kraft unseres Zusammenlebens an, in dem die Menschen auch in diesen herausfordernden Zeiten so viel einbringen und leisten.
text_en: What matters now is the strength of our coexistence, in which people contribute and achieve so much even in these challenging times.
context: It is a question of who will bear government responsibility for our country in these challenging times. What matters now is the strength of our coexistence, in which people contribute and achieve so much even in these challenging times.
input_text: What matters now is the strength of our coexistence, in which people contribute and achieve so much even in these challenging times. </s> </s> It is a question of who will bear government responsibility for our country in these challenging times. What matters now is the strength of our coexistence, in which people contribute and achieve so much even in these challenging times. </s>

text: Wir nehmen diese Kraft als Auftrag an die Politik, unser Land für alle Menschen in den kommenden Jahren besser, gerechter und einfacher zu machen.
text_en: We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years.
context: What matters now is the strength of our coexistence, in which people contribute and achieve so much even in these challenging times. We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years.
input_text: We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years. </s> </s> What matters now is the strength of our coexistence, in which people contribute and achieve so much even in these challenging times. We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years. </s>

text: Als Auftrag, dass es hier einfach funktioniert
text_en: As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here
context: We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years. As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here and that everyday life is affordable.
input_text: As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here </s> </s> We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years. As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here and that everyday life is affordable. </s>

text: und der Alltag bezahlbar ist.
text_en: and that everyday life is affordable.
context: We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years. As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here and that everyday life is affordable.
input_text: and that everyday life is affordable. </s> </s> We take this strength as a mandate to politicians to make our country better, fairer and simpler for everyone in the coming years. As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here and that everyday life is affordable. </s>

text: Als Auftrag, unsere Verantwortung in einer kommenden Regierung wahrzunehmen.
text_en: As a mandate to assume our responsibility in the next government.
context: As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here and that everyday life is affordable. As a mandate to assume our responsibility in the next government.
input_text: As a mandate to assume our responsibility in the next government. </s> </s> As a mandate to ensure that things simply work here and that everyday life is affordable. As a mandate to assume our responsibility in the next government. </s>

text: Deutschland hat viele große Stärken.
text_en: Germany has many great strengths.
context: As a mandate to assume our responsibility in the next government. Germany has many great strengths.
input_text: Germany has many great strengths. </s> </s> As a mandate to assume our responsibility in the next government. Germany has many great strengths. </s>

text: Mit der Kraft von Ihnen, den Bürgerinnen und Bürgern, die den Laden jeden Tag trotz der großen Herausforderungen am Laufen halten.
text_en: With the strength of you, the citizens, who keep the store running every day despite the major challenges.
context: Germany has many great strengths. With the strength of you, the citizens, who keep the store running every day despite the major challenges.
input_text: With the strength of you, the citizens, who keep the store running every day despite the major challenges. </s> </s> Germany has many great strengths. With the strength of you, the citizens, who keep the store running every day despite the major challenges. </s>

input_text: At work. </s> </s> With the strength of you, the citizens, who keep the store running every day despite the major challenges. At work. </s>

input_text: In the family. </s> </s> At work. In the family. </s>

text_en: In voluntary work.
context: In the family. In voluntary work.
input_text: In voluntary work. </s> </s> In the family. In voluntary work. </s>

text: Mit viel Engagement und Einsatz.
text_en: With a great deal of commitment and dedication.

input_text: With a great deal of commitment and dedication. </s> </s> In voluntary work. With a great deal of commitment and dedication. </s>

text_en: With a strong welfare state
context: With a great deal of commitment and dedication. With a strong welfare state and successful companies, not least in the SME sector.

text: Wir verhandeln entsprechend folgender Prinzipien: rechtsverbindliche und einklagbare ökonomische, soziale und ökologische Standards;
text_en: We negotiate according to the following principles: legally binding and enforceable economic, social and environmental standards;
context: High standards of social justice, climate protection, nature conservation, animal welfare and human rights also protect the European economy from harmful undercutting competition and prevent exploitation or environmental destruction in other countries. We negotiate according to the following principles: legally binding and enforceable economic, social and environmental standards; anchoring the precautionary principle; a binding anchoring of the Paris Climate Agreement, the central labor protection conventions of the International Labor Organization (ILO) and the Convention on Biological Diversity; ending the abusive use of arbitration tribunals and limiting future investment agreements to direct expropriation and discrimination.

text: Die EU-Lieferkettenrichtlinie ist eine große Errungenschaft: Verbraucherinnen in Europa können sicher sein, dass Produkte, die sie hier kaufen, frei von Ausbeutung und Kinderarbeit entstanden sind.
text_en: The EU Supply Chain Directive is a major achievement: consumers in Europe can be sure that products they buy here have been produced free from exploitation and child labor.

text: Wir sorgen dafür, dass die Lieferkettenrichtlinie unbürokratisch in deutsches Recht übertragen wird.

text: So schaffen wir einen Binnenmarkt, in dem die europäische Wirtschaft durch unseren Einsatz für das europäische und deutsche Lieferkettengesetz global Verantwortung übernimmt.
text_en: In this way, we are creating a single market in which the European economy assumes global responsibility through our commitment to the European and German Supply Chain Act.

text: Die Schlupflöcher im Zollrecht müssen geschlossen werden, durch die besonders asiatische Onlinehändler wie Temu unsichere Wegwerfprodukte am Zoll vorbeischleusen und europäische Hersteller unterbieten.

text: Um den Herausforderungen und der Dringlichkeit der Klimakrise zu begegnen, werden wir die Rolle des Expertenrates für Klimafragen sowie die Verantwortung von Sektoren im BundesKlimaschutzgesetz stärken, in denen Klimaschutz zu wenig vorankommt.
text_en: In order to meet the challenges and urgency of the climate crisis, we will strengthen the role of the Expert Council for Climate Issues and the responsibility of sectors in the Federal Climate Protection Act where climate protection is making too little progress.

text: Bei prognostizierter längerfristiger Zielverfehlung soll in den jeweiligen Sektoren verbindlich nachgesteuert werden, denn andernfalls drohen Deutschland teure Strafzahlungen und zukünftig höhere CO2-Preise, beides wollen wir für öffentliche Haushalte und Bürgerinnen vermeiden.
text_en: If longer-term targets are predicted to be missed, binding measures will be taken in the respective sectors, otherwise Germany will face expensive fines and higher CO2 prices in the future, both of which we want to avoid for public budgets and citizens.
context: In order to meet the challenges and urgency of the climate crisis, we will strengthen the role of the Expert Council for Climate Issues and the responsibility of sectors in the Federal Climate Protection Act where climate protection is making too little progress. text: Dazu wollen wir einen Schub für den Naturschutz: wirksame Maßnahmen gegen weiteren Flächenverbrauch, unbürokratische und schnellere Ausweisung von Naturschutzgebieten und die Übertragung von weiteren geeigneten Flächen ins Nationale Naturerbe sowie zusammenhängende Biotopverbünde und Großschutzgebiete nach dem Vorbild des ostdeutschen Großschutzgebietsprogramms während der Friedlichen Revolution.
text_en: To this end, we want a boost for nature conservation: effective measures against further land consumption, unbureaucratic and faster designation of nature conservation areas and the transfer of further suitable areas to the National Natural Heritage as well as contiguous biotope networks and large protected areas based on the model of the East German large protected area program during the Peaceful Revolution.
context: This is because ecosystem-based nature and species conservation is also in society's overriding interest. text: Den unnatürlichen und unwirtschaftlichen Ausbau der Flüsse, wie er zum Beispiel an der Mittelelbe oder an der Grenzoder geplant ist, lehnen wir ab und wollen die rechtlichen Grundlagen der grenzüberschreitenden Flusspolitik gemeinsam mit unseren Nachbarländern naturgerecht ausrichten.
text_en: We reject the unnatural and uneconomical development of rivers, such as that planned for the Middle Elbe or the Border Oder, and want to work with our neighboring countries to align the legal basis of cross-border river policy with nature.
context: Free-flowing rivers, near-natural forests and floodplains, moors and extensively used agricultural landscapes as well as wild pastures play a central role and must be preserved or restored wherever possible. text: Wir gestalten die Energiewende naturschutzverträglich und lösen unvermeidbare Zielkonflikte zwischen erneuerbaren Energien sowie Natur- und Artenschutz auf der Grundlage neu gewonnener Erkenntnisse und steuern dort, wo es notwendig ist, unter Einbindung des Fachverstandes von Wissenschaft, Naturschutz und Planer*innen nach.
text_en: We will make the energy transition compatible with nature conservation and resolve unavoidable conflicts of objectives between renewable energies and nature and species conservation on the basis of newly acquired knowledge and, where necessary, make adjustments with the involvement of the expertise of science, nature conservation and planners.

text: Um die Inflation der vergangenen Jahre auszugleichen, braucht es jetzt einen schrittweise steigenden Mindestlohn von zunächst 15 Euro in 2025 und das auch für unter 18-Jährige.

text: Hierfür verankern wir den Referenzwert von 60 Prozent des Medianlohns aus der EU-Mindestlohnrichtlinie in das deutsche Mindestlohngesetz.

text: Das gilt insbesondere für den bisherigen Kinderzuschlag und die Leistungen der Bildung und Teilhabe, deren direkte Abrufung - beispielsweise durch Schulen, Sportvereine oder Musikschulen - wir erleichtern wollen.
text_en: This applies in particular to the existing child supplement and education and participation benefits, which we want to make easier to access directly - for example through schools, sports clubs or music schools.

text: Gleichzeitig erinnern wir uns an den Mut und das Engagement der Bürgerinnen, die 1989 mit der Friedlichen Revolution das Ende der SED-Diktatur und den demokratischen Neuanfang in einem vereinten Deutschland im Herzen Europas ermöglicht haben.
text_en: At the same time, we remember the courage and commitment of the citizens who made the end of the SED dictatorship and the democratic new beginning in a united Germany in the heart of Europe possible with the Peaceful Revolution in 1989.
context: We are also committed to the rehabilitation and eligibility of victims of the GDR doping system. text: Wir unterstützen die Einrichtung des „Forum Opposition und Widerstand 1945-1990“ und des „Zukunftszentrums für Deutsche Einheit und Europäische Transformation“ in Halle als Orte des Austausches, der Forschung und der Aufarbeitung zur Stärkung eines gemeinsamen europäischen Verständnisses von Freiheit und Demokratie.
text_en: We support the establishment of the "Forum Opposition and Resistance 1945-1990" and the "Future Center for German Unity and European Transformation" in Halle as places of exchange, research and reappraisal to strengthen a common European understanding of freedom and democracy.
context: At the same time, we remember the courage and commitment of the citizens who made the end of the SED dictatorship and the democratic new beginning in a united Germany in the heart of Europe possible with the Peaceful Revolution in 1989. text: In der Bundesregierung haben wir die Aufarbeitung der deutschen Kolonialvergangenheit, insbesondere des Völkermords an den Herero und Nama, im Dialog mit den betroffenen Ländern vorangetrieben.
text_en: In the Federal Government, we have driven forward the process of coming to terms with Germany's colonial past, in particular the genocide of the Herero and Nama, in dialog with the countries affected.
context: We support the establishment of the "Forum Opposition and Resistance 1945-1990" and the "Future Center for German Unity and European Transformation" in Halle as places of exchange, research and reappraisal to strengthen a common European understanding of freedom and democracy. text: Diesen Prozess wollen wir weiterführen und ihn durch ein Lern- und Erinnerungszentrum und mithilfe lokaler Initiativen in die Gesellschaft tragen.

text: Wir wollen bei Provenienzforschung und der Rückführung von menschlichen Überresten und Kulturgütern aus kolonialem Kontext die angemessene Beteiligung der Herkunftsgesellschaften und die Übernahme von mit der Rückgabe verbundenen Kosten gewährleisten.
text_en: In provenance research and the repatriation of human remains and cultural assets from colonial contexts, we want to ensure the appropriate participation of the communities of origin and the assumption of the costs associated with restitution.
context: We want to continue this process and bring it into society through a learning and remembrance center and with the help of local initiatives. text: Gegen den fortbestehenden Handel mit menschlichen Überresten, vor allem aus kolonialen Kontexten, wollen wir vorgehen.

text: Viele finanzschwache Kommunen, die einen Strukturwandel durchgemacht haben, sitzen bis heute auf hohen Schuldenbergen und stecken angesichts drückender Zinsen in einem Teufelskreis.
text_en: Many financially weak municipalities that have undergone structural change are still sitting on mountains of debt and are stuck in a vicious circle in the face of oppressive interest rates.

text_en: In order to further promote equality, we will also consistently implement the requirements of the more far-reaching EU directive on management positions in Germany and introduce sanctions if the targets are not met.

text: Gegen antidemokratische Bewegungen, die einen ideologischen Kampf gegen unsere offene Gesellschaft führen, arbeiten wir für die Unabhängigkeit und Freiheit der Kultur, der Künstler*innen und ihrer diversen Ausdrucksformen - ob Literatur, Film, Musik, Theater, Tanz oder bildende Kunst, ob Mode, Architektur oder Design, ob Club oder Oper, ob öffentliche Einrichtung oder Teil der großen Kultur- und Kreativwirtschaft.
text_en: Against anti-democratic movements that wage an ideological battle against our open society, we work for the independence and freedom of culture, artists and their diverse forms of expression - whether literature, film, music, theater, dance or visual arts, whether fashion, architecture or design, whether club or opera, whether public institution or part of the large cultural and creative industries.
context: We want to create a cultural offering that is as diverse as the country itself and offers access to all people. text_en: After decades of sealing off our labour market, we are finally turning the digitalization of visa issuance on its head so that skilled workers and professionals choose our country.

text: Die Staatsbürgerschaft stellt für Menschen, die schon lange hier leben - zum Beispiel die Generation der Gastarbeiter*innen -, ein dauerhaftes Band rechtlicher Gleichheit, Teilhabe und Zugehörigkeit sicher.

text: Mit der ersten China- Strategie der Bundesregierung haben wir begonnen, die jahrelange Naivität in der deutschen China-Politik zu beenden - diese gilt es nun konsequent gemeinsam mit unseren europäischen Partnern umzusetzen und weiterzuentwickeln.

text_en: This also includes de-risking: we want to reduce one-sided and risky dependencies on China and broaden our trade relations in order to ensure economic stability and political freedom of action in the long term.

text: Mit diesem Ziel wollen wir klare, transparente und an Menschenrechten, unseren Werten und Sicherheitsinteressen orientierte Kriterien für Rüstungsexporte auf nationaler und europäischer Ebene stärker gesetzlich verankern - mit vorangehenden Risikoanalysen, einklagbaren Sanktionsmöglichkeiten und Endverbleibskontrollen.

text: Dafür fördern wir beispielsweise agrarökologische Ansätze, beenden den Export von Pestiziden und Pestizidwirkstoffen, die bei uns aufgrund von Umwelt- und Gesundheitsrisiken nicht zugelassen oder verboten sind, schützen Landrechte von Kleinbäuer*innen und unterstützen wirksame Mechanismen gegen exzessive Finanzmarktspekulationen mit Wasser, Land und Lebensmitteln.
text_en: To this end, we are promoting agroecological approaches, for example, ending the export of pesticides and pesticide active ingredients that are not approved or are banned in our country due to environmental and health risks, protecting the land rights of small farmers and supporting effective mechanisms against excessive financial market speculation with water, land and food.

context: To this end, we are promoting agroecological approaches, for example, ending the export of pesticides and pesticide active ingredients that are not approved or are banned in our country due to environmental and health risks, protecting the land rights of small farmers and supporting effective mechanisms against excessive financial market speculation with water, land and food. The Covid-19 pandemic and increasing antibiotic resistance worldwide show that health requires global and forward-looking cooperation.

The Covid-19 pandemic and increasing antibiotic resistance worldwide show that health requires global and forward-looking cooperation. </s>

text: In diesem Sinne wollen wir Partnerländer im Aufbau ihrer Gesundheitssysteme unterstützen, die Weltgesundheitsorganisation (WHO) stärken und ein internationales Pandemieabkommen vorantreiben.
text_en: With this in mind, we want to support partner countries in developing their healthcare systems, strengthen the World Health Organization (WHO) and promote an international pandemic agreement.
context: The Covid-19 pandemic and increasing antibiotic resistance worldwide show that health requires global and forward-looking cooperation. text_en: We therefore promote the active transfer of technology and knowledge and - where necessary - the sharing of intellectual property in order to produce these healthcare products more cost-effectively and in line with demand.

text: Wir setzen uns dafür ein, dass Deutschland seine internationalen Zusagen einhält und mindestens die in der Organisation für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (OECD) und den Vereinten Nationen vereinbarte Quote von 0,7 Prozent des Bruttonationaleinkommens in Entwicklungszusammenarbeit investiert und davon 0,2 Prozent für die sogenannten am wenigsten entwickelten Länder zur Verfügung stellt.
text_en: We are committed to ensuring that Germany keeps its international commitments and invests at least the quota of 0.7 percent of gross national income agreed in the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and the United Nations in development cooperation and makes 0.2 percent of this available for the so-called least developed countries.
context: We support the development of social security systems as a sustainable instrument against poverty. text: Um zur Deckung des massiven Investitionsbedarfs beizutragen, wollen wir zusätzliche Mittel mobilisieren und dafür auch den deutschen Entwicklungsbanken einen verstärkten Zugang zum Kapitalmarkt ermöglichen, insbesondere durch die Erhöhung des Gewährleistungsrahmens des Bundes.
text_en: In order to help cover the massive need for investment, we want to mobilize additional funds and also give German development banks greater access to the capital market, in particular by increasing the federal government's guarantee framework.
